CUSTOM-FIELDS.conditional_hint: If activated, you will have the possibility to condition the appearance of this value according to the value of another field

CUSTOM-FIELDS.regex_remove_keyword_explanation:
For this option to be taken into account, the keyword must be present in the field Regular expression (REGEX) with keyword removal
Example: INVOICE\s*NUMBER\s*:\s*
CUSTOM-FIELDS.regex_remove_keyword_hint: If enabled, the keyword will be removed from the regex result to keep only the data
CUSTOM-FIELDS.regex_remove_special_char: Remove special characters from regex result
